casebody.data:
OHIO RENAL ASSN.
v.
KIDNEY DIALYSIS PATIENT PROTECTION AMENDMENT COMMT. 2018-1047 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 1, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

Miscellaneous case. On joint emergency motion to clarify or to modify and expedite scheduling order. Motion granted in part. The following revised schedule is set for the filing of briefs and evidence: Relators shall file their brief and evidence no later than 5:00 p.m. on Friday, August 3, 2018, respondents shall file their brief and evidence no later than 5:00 p.m. on Monday, August 6, 2018, and relators may file a reply brief no later than 5:00 p.m. on Tuesday, August 7, 2018.
